nodes.text: A farmer lived on the planet Ord Mantell not long after the planet was colonized around 12,000 BBY. One night, the farmer was part of a convoy that broke down on a remote plain, and the convoy fell prey to a pack of the native razoronn predators. The curious razoronns dragged away the farmers, who had intruded on their hunting grounds, and the farmer was the only member of the convoy who had not been killed by morning.
